title: Freljord Taliyah Skin Causing Crippling lag.
body: Not sure why, but whenever I play with Freljord Taliyah skin, my entire game lags. Doesn't happen with any other champion or skin, just with Freljord Taliyah.

replies.body: Hmmmmm there might be something weird going on with the game files that Freljord Taliyah uses. If those files became corrupted, it might be causing that weird 'lag'. Grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with the repatch option selected. Hit me back and let me know how that helped!
